Post.title: Two Language Welcome to use hexo-theme-redefine
Post._content: {% notel yellow fa-lightbulb tips %} `hexo-theme-redefine` [](https://redefine.ohevan.com/) This article is made up of `hexo-theme-redefine` theme of one of the contributors to maintain, does not represent the official position, the official information please check on the [Offcial Website](https://redefine.ohevan.com/). {% endnotel %} ![](https://github.com/EvanNotFound/hexo-theme-redefine/assets/68590232/f2ff10f6-a740-4120-ba04-1b2a518fb019) ## hexo-theme-redefine `Redefine` Hexo `Redefine` is a simple, fast, pure Hexo theme, its simple beauty is far from ordinary, let people appreciate the power of design. This theme not only contains many practical and rich functions, but also gives a refined and excellent design concept. [hexo-theme-keep](https://github.com/XPoet/hexo-theme-keep) Theme Building on the solid foundation of [hexo-theme-keep](https://github.com/XPoet/hexo-theme-keep), `Redefine` elevates the style and incorporates valuable writing tools and plugins. It offers extensive customization options, allowing you to tailor every detail to your preferences. With Redefine, your blogging experience becomes unique and effortless, showcasing your personal style and needs. ## // Official Website {% btn regular::Github::https://www.ohevan.com::fa-brands fa-github %} {% btn regular::::https://redefine.ohevan.com::fa-solid fa-browswer %} {% btn regular::::https://redefine-docs.ohevan.com::fa-duotone fa-book %} ## // Other Information ## // Introduction Redefine The Redefine theme takes into account the user's interaction, and has flexible adjustment modules in the sidebar, toolbar, etc ![ Abundant sidebar control](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/FrederickBun/upyun-rhimgcdn@img/upload/202406282040889.webp) yaml For those who are not familiar with the code, we have prepared beautiful page templates, and we will add more page templates for everyone to use in the future. This reduces the need for users to write their own page by yaml files ![ Beautiful built-in pages](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/FrederickBun/upyun-rhimgcdn@img/upload/202406290819065.webp) In order to make theme deployment smoother for users, the theme team has written a highly readable set of documents, with the belief of "teaching by hand" to improve the documentation ![ Hightly readable documentation](https://s2.loli.net/2024/06/28/8pSfMcBNgRIbHXn.webp) 2024/06/28starGithub1.3k+Stars Of course, there is also a lot of user support for us, this is the star situation as of 2024/06/28, we have 1.3k+ Stars on Github. So, you're not tempted yet? ![1.3k+ Stars](https://s2.loli.net/2024/06/28/pJTvmetDgR21U6I.webp) ## // Support **pull request** **issues**. [contact@ohevan.com ](mailto:contact@ohevan.com). Github Star

This theme not only contains many practical and rich functions, but also gives a refined and excellent design concept. [hexo-theme-keep](https://github.com/XPoet/hexo-theme-keep) Theme Building on the solid foundation of [hexo-theme-keep](https://github.com/XPoet/hexo-theme-keep), `Redefine` elevates the style and incorporates valuable writing tools and plugins. It offers extensive customization options, allowing you to tailor every detail to your preferences. With Redefine, your blogging experience becomes unique and effortless, showcasing your personal style and needs. ## // Official Website {% btn regular::Github::https://www.ohevan.com::fa-brands fa-github %} {% btn regular::::https://redefine.ohevan.com::fa-solid fa-browswer %} {% btn regular::::https://redefine-docs.ohevan.com::fa-duotone fa-book %} ## // Other Information ## // Introduction Redefine The Redefine theme takes into account the user's interaction, and has flexible adjustment modules in the sidebar, toolbar, etc ![ Abundant sidebar control](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/FrederickBun/upyun-rhimgcdn@img/upload/202406282040889.webp) yaml For those who are not familiar with the code, we have prepared beautiful page templates, and we will add more page templates for everyone to use in the future. This reduces the need for users to write their own page by yaml files ![ Beautiful built-in pages](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/FrederickBun/upyun-rhimgcdn@img/upload/202406290819065.webp) In order to make theme deployment smoother for users, the theme team has written a highly readable set of documents, with the belief of "teaching by hand" to improve the documentation ![ Hightly readable documentation](https://s2.loli.net/2024/06/28/8pSfMcBNgRIbHXn.webp) 2024/06/28starGithub1.3k+Stars Of course, there is also a lot of user support for us, this is the star situation as of 2024/06/28, we have 1.3k+ Stars on Github. So, you're not tempted yet? ![1.3k+ Stars](https://s2.loli.net/2024/06/28/pJTvmetDgR21U6I.webp) ## // Support **pull request** **issues**. [contact@ohevan.com ](mailto:contact@ohevan.com). Github Star
Post.content:
tips

hexo-theme-redefine

This article is made up of hexo-theme-redefine theme of one of the contributors to maintain, does not represent the official position, the official information please check on the Offcial Website .

hexo-theme-redefine

Redefine Hexo

Redefine is a simple, fast, pure Hexo theme, its simple beauty is far from ordinary, let people appreciate the power of design. This theme not only contains many practical and rich functions, but also gives a refined and excellent design concept.

hexo-theme-keep

Theme Building on the solid foundation of hexo-theme-keep , Redefine elevates the style and incorporates valuable writing tools and plugins. It offers extensive customization options, allowing you to tailor every detail to your preferences. With Redefine, your blogging experience becomes unique and effortless, showcasing your personal style and needs.

// Official Website

Github

// Other Information

// Introduction

Redefine

The Redefine theme takes into account the users interaction, and has flexible adjustment modules in the sidebar, toolbar, etc

yaml

For those who are not familiar with the code, we have prepared beautiful page templates, and we will add more page templates for everyone to use in the future. This reduces the need for users to write their own page by yaml files

In order to make theme deployment smoother for users, the theme team has written a highly readable set of documents, with the belief of teaching by hand to improve the documentation

2024/06/28starGithub1.3k+Stars

Of course, there is also a lot of user support for us, this is the star situation as of 2024/06/28, we have 1.3k+ Stars on Github. So, youre not tempted yet?

// Support

pull request issues.

contact@ohevan.com .

Github Star

## FastIOS.h







 `cin cout` 

**stringc**

#### 

 `using namespace FastIOS;`

 `-DLOCAL`

 `cin cout` `qin qout`

rp++AC

#### 

##### 

 `qin qout` 

-  `LACAL`  `-DLOCAL` `qins qouts`
-  `NORMAL`  `-DNORMAL` `qinn qoutn`
-  `qinf qoutf`

`qins qouts``qinn qoutn``qinf qoutf`

- `qins qouts` **OJ&&**
- `qinn qoutn` **OJ&** `Ctrl+Z`)
- `qinf qoutf` **OJ&** `Ctrl+Z`)



 `<cstdio>` `std::getchar()``std::putchar()`

 `<cstdio>` `fread()``fwrite()`

 `<iostream>` `std::streambuf()`cincout

## BigNumber.h



### 

 `using namespace BigNumber;`

 `bignumber a`



- `a+b`
- `a-b`
- `a*b`(FFT)
- `a/b`
- `a%b`
- `abs(a)`
- `to_int(a)` `int`
- `to_long_long` `long long`

 `cin cout` `FastIOS.h`

## ExSort.h



#### 

 `std::sort`~~[](https://zh.cppreference.com/w/cpp/algorithm/sort)~~

~~[](https://zh.cppreference.com/w/cpp/language/overload_resolution)~~

# Code

```C++
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define int long long
#define endl "\n"
using namespace std;
signed main()
{
    int n, x, y;
    cin >> n >> x >> y ;
    int rx = 1, num = y;  // rxnum
    int up = 1, down = n, zuo = 1, you = n;  // xy
    bool fx = true;  // truefalse
    while (rx != x)  // 
    {
        if (fx)  // 
        {
            if (you == y)  // 
            {
                num += x - rx;  // 
                break;
            }
        }
        else
        {
            if (zuo == y)  // 
            {
                num += rx - x;
                break;
            }
        }
        if (fx) // 
        {
            num += (you - y + 1) * 2 + down - rx - 2;  // 
            rx = down;  // 
            you -- ;  // 
            up ++ ;  // 
        }
        else // 
        {
            num += (y - zuo + 1) * 2 + rx - up - 2;  // 
            rx = up;  // 
            zuo  ++  ;  // 
            down -- ;  // 
        }
        fx = !fx;  // 
    }
    cout << num ;
    return 0;
}
```
